modShortDescription: This is a core mod to create dungeons and indestructible POIs in the 7 Days to Die. Optional addon: Dungeon Blocks GSS Bifroest.
modDescription:
This is a core mod to create dungeons and indestructible POIs in the 7 Days to Die.

The Dungeon Blocks Mod has 200+ colorable and indestructible block shapes. The selection of the shape can be opened by a long press on the R key. You need the Dungeon Block Variant Helper to repair it. To destroy you need Mjölnir (Admin Hammer) – first right click then left click. The Mod also includes 187 glass shapes and 40 misc blocks.

* **200+ Block Shapes**  
   * Indestructible and colorable
* **180+ Glass Shapes**  
   * Indestructible
* **40+ Misc Blocks**  
   * Indestructible doors (normal / locked / electric)  
   * Indestructible printing plates / switches / signs / fence  
   * Invisible pillars
* **Summarized in 3 Variant Helper (Creative + Dev)**  
   * Dungeon Blocks / Dungeon Glass / Dungeon Misc
* **Reworked Mjölnir (admin hammer)**  
   * Unlucky to unleash his true strength you can break Uru and tear it fast down afterwards.
* **Seperate Admin Mod (inside mod folder)**  
   * Drag and Drop the Mod out to activate extra options  
   * Makes invisible blocks visible  
   * Let you pick up all blocks with E  
   * Give all block adv. rotation

* Its all about respect – just ask for it and do not steal it.

**Optional addon:** [Dungeon Blocks GSS Bifroest](https://7daystodiemods.com/dungeon-blocks-gss-bifroest/)

**Manuell Installation:**

1. Download and unpack the Zip data.
2. Place it into your “Mods” folder.
3. Have fun!

**[Download](https://gitlab.com/EihwazDE/7D2D/-/archive/master/7D2D-master.zip?path=Dungeon%20Blocks)**

If you appreciate Eihwaz’s work and you want to show support, use this [donate link](https://www.paypal.com/pools/c/8nSUn4KFGL).
